item.title: EP 964 - He Went Into The Bathroom . . . And He Never Came Out!
item.itunes:title: He Went Into The Bathroom . . . And He Never Came Out!
item.description:
Today we find out a conspiracy theorists can give you cavities, and then we discuss a mysterious disappearance at a haunted department store!

https://www.amazon.com/dp/1626726825/ref=redir_mobile_desktop?_encoding=UTF8&ref_=cm_cr_othr_mb_bdcrb_top#cm_cr_carousel_images_section

https://www.times-news.com/opinion/letters_to_the_editor/chinese-fluoride-is-a-homeland-security-matter/article_ce02e184-5b59-5c7b-ad25-befba36c49f7.html

https://www.mass.gov/doc/2021-list-of-massachusetts-citiestowns-by-community-water-fluoridation-status/download

A California Father Claims QAnon Conspiracy Led Him To Kill His 2 Children, FBI Says

https://www.npr.org/2021/08/13/1027133867/children-dead-father-claims-qanon-conspiracy-led-him-to-kill

Surf Dad Who Killed His 2 Children After QAnon ‘Enlightened’ Him Said He Was Neo from ‘The Matrix’: Affidavit

https://www.crimeonline.com/2022/03/02/surf-dad-who-killed-his-2-children-after-qanon-enlightened-him-said-he-was-neo-from-the-matrix-affidavit/

QAnon Dad: I Was ‘Deceived’ and ‘Delusional’ When I Shot My Children With a Spearfishing Gun

https://www.crimeonline.com/2022/06/16/qanon-dad-i-was-deceived-and-delusional-when-i-shot-my-children-with-a-spearfishing-gun/

Colorado

Colorado Springs Wards Store Disappearing Child In Bathroom sotry

http://www.theshadowlands.net/places/colorado.htm

Archive

https://archive.ph/yUzx1

Unexpected Colorado Springs Hauntings

https://ourcommunitynow.com/lifestyle/unexpected-colorado-springs-hauntings

https://www.ghostlyworld.org/arbys-in-colorado-springs-colorado/

Oceanside boy’s killer hangs himself in prison

https://www.sandiegouniontribune.com/news/sdut-inmate-death-row-1998-oceanside-child-murder-found-2011nov17-story.html
